author: Dr. Christine Gibson,Dr. Joe Vipond,Dr. Jacqui Hakes
title: We urgently need to start making more masks in Canada - and wearing them
description: Hand-washing and isolation are crucial, but some see masks as an additional layer of public protection.
content:
This column is an opinion by Dr. Christine Gibson, Dr. Jacqui Hakes and Dr. Joe Vipond. For more information about CBC's Opinion section, please see the FAQ.
If we are going to bend the curve on COVID-19, we're going to need to emulate the winners to date: C… [+6878 chars]
